review: If some instructions came with it, it might be work better.  At this point I would not recommend to a friend.

review: Pretty awesome. Making any tv smart & so easy to install!

review: I love it, It's a great investment about to buy a second one for my other Television.

review: Exactly what I was looking for! Very user friendly!

review: Love it, easy to use and way more stuff to watch than I will ever have time for.  I highly recommend getting the remote with voice search.  That saves lots of time looking for programing.  Brilliant
author: Amazon Customer
